title: Fragment, 18th or 19th  century
medium:
Medium: wool
Technique: felted and stenciled
creditline: Gift of the estate of Mrs. Lathrop Colgate Harper
description: Rectangle of cream colored felt, printed in blue and red in two square designs of clouds, zig-zags of lightening (?) and wild-haired man. Each edsign outlined by a band of blue dots.
